review: First tried the Fire Stick but was underwhelmed with lost network issues.  So I bit the bullet and got the Fire box, which is wired directly to the Comcast modem.  Now we are experiencing what we expected, with seem less streaming of Netflix, Prime Video, Sling TV, Watch ESPN and Pandora.It can also do apps, and unlike Apple TV, you can choose which ones you have.  If you have a Kindle Fire, many of those apps will also work on the Fire TV, although some require a separate game controller.  But it might be worth it to see the Game Of Thrones app on a 42- to  65-inch screen instead of a 7- to 9-inch tablet!But overall, the Fire TV does what it's supposed to do, and so far it does it well.  If you have one or Kindle Fires and Amazon's Prime Membership, the Fire TV completes the entertainment trifecta.
author: Ron Shearer "Sports from A to Zito"
